articles.title: Indian-American scientist wins prestigious Shaw Prize for Astronomy research - Firstpost
articles.description: Other Shaw Prize recipients include US scientists Peter Sarnak, who received the Shaw Prize in Mathematical Sciences, and Swee Lay Thein and Stuart Orkin, who received the Shaw Prize in Life Science and Medicine in equal shares. Kulkarni is the George Ellery …
articles.content: The annual Shaw Prize in Astronomy will be awarded to US professor of astronomy Shrinivas R. Kulkarni, who is of Indian descent, for his groundbreaking research on millisecond pulsars, gamma-ray burs… [+2162 chars]
